accessibility_about_us.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page.

accessibility_advertise.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about how to buy advertising.

accessibility_aerials_won_percent.comment: Stat indicating how many aerial duels the player or team has won

accessibility_age_confirmation.comment: Popup header - used when a user needs to consent to being 18+.

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_ne.comment: Button indicating if user is below the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "Below 18"

accessibility_age_confirmation_button_po.comment: Button indicating if user is above the age limit. The placeholder is the age. So it can be "18+" or "18 and over"

accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.comment: Popup subtext - used when a user needs to verify his age to display betting odds
accessibility_age_confirmation_subtitle.value: To display odds we need to verify your age

accessibility_all_stats.comment: Text shown on a link that lets the user see all the stats.

accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.comment: Text appearing when app notifications are off.
accessibility_app_notifications_off_desc.value: You have disabled Notifications for FotMob

accessibility_assist_by.comment: Shown in match facts when a player got an assist for a goal. Example: "Assist by Lionel Messi"

accessibility_by_date.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league sorted by date.

accessibility_by_round.comment: Text shown on toggle that shows matches in a league or tournament sorted by round.

accessibility_career_stats.comment: Text shown on tab header for tab that shows the career stats for a player.

accessibility_careers.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about career opportunities.

accessibility_city.comment: Text shown for venue on a match if do not have a link to it.

accessibility_club_team.comment: This is a header to indicate the team club a player plays on when he is playing for the national team. So for Ronaldo it would be "Club => Manchester United". Feel free to translate it to the same as the "Team" translation if Team and Club is the same in your language.

accessibility_coach_win_percentage.comment: Percentage of games won out of total played.

accessibility_company.comment: Text on button or link that redirects to the About us page with information about our company.

accessibility_cookie_policy.comment: Text shown on link that redirects to the page that shows the cookie policy document.

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match

accessibility_crosses_succeeeded_accurac.comment: Number of successful crosses for a player in a match measured in percent

accessibility_date.comment: Text shown in table header for cells that show the date a match was played.

accessibility_days.comment: A label below a number indicating how many days are left until tournament starts

accessibility_defensive_actions.comment: Football (soccer) stat to describe how many defensive actions a player has made. A defensive action is an attempt to win back possession of the ball, like tackles, interceptions, clearances, blocks and aerial duels.

accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.comment: Explains what defensive actions are. Use the same terminology as in the "defensive_actions" and the other relevant stat names.
accessibility_defensive_actions_explaine.value: Defensive actions include all attempted tackles, blocks, clearances, fouls, and interceptions.

accessibility_duel_won_percent.comment: Duel over the possession of the ball where a player wins the ball

accessibility_europa_conference_league_p.comment: This is a brand new league by UEFA. Details here:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Europa_Conference_League. Indicates that the team can participate in the playoffs for this tournament.

accessibility_events.comment: Used as a header for a tab that lets the user see the events log for a match. Keep it short.

accessibility_expected_goals_non_penalty.comment: Expected goals from shots that are not penalties. Keep the "xG" part as it is.

accessibility_fouls_won.comment: Number of fouls a player has won in a match

accessibility_fullscreen.comment: Button text - click on it to open play-by-play in fullscreen.

accessibility_gfx_season_stats.comment: Used as a title on graphics card for with season stats. Very limited room. Find shortest possible version

accessibility_header_search_placeholder.comment: Placeholder text for a search bar where the user can search for leagues, teams, players and news.

accessibility_highest_rank.comment: Label for field that shows a teams highest FIFA rank value.

accessibility_historical_table_positions.comment: Header text over graph that shows a team's historical table positions.

accessibility_history.comment: Tab header for page with historical team data.

accessibility_keeper_saves.comment: Stat for the number of keeper saves in the match

accessibility_keeper_sweeper_actions.comment: This is a label for a trait for a keeper where indicating how often he acts as a sweeper. That means that he comes out of the goal area and clears the bell. May be translated as "Clearances outside box" or "Rushed actions" if sweeper can't be translated.

accessibility_live_score_filter_hint.comment: Hint text on the live scores filter that lets the use filter matches by typing in a country, team or league name.

accessibility_load_more.comment: Text on button that lets the user load more news articles.

accessibility_login_disclaimer.comment: Text shown in the "Sign in" dialogue. Links to pages with Terms of use and Privacy policy will be shown below the text.
accessibility_login_disclaimer.value: By signing in you accept the Terms of use and Privacy Policy.

accessibility_long_ball_succeeeded_accur.comment: Number of successful long balls for a player in a match measured in percent

accessibility_most_recent.comment: Used in transfer center to order transfers by most recent.

accessibility_no_bots_allowed.comment: Text shown in the footer to emphasize that web scraping is not permitted.
accessibility_no_bots_allowed.value: The use of automatic services (robots, crawler, indexing etc.) as well as other methods for systematic or regular use is not permitted.

accessibility_no_next_match.comment: Text shown when there are no new matches scheduled for the team or league.

accessibility_non_penalty_xg.comment: Expected goals for a player where we excluded the xG on penalties

accessibility_odds.comment: Used for the Odds tab title

accessibility_on_tv.comment: Text on button that shows matches that are shown on TV.

accessibility_past_matches.comment: Text shown on a link that lets the user see all finished matches for a team or league.

accessibility_penalty_saves.comment: Number of times a keeper has saved a penalty

accessibility_players_and_managers.comment: Header text shown above list of search results for players and managers.

accessibility_playing_now_no_ranked_leag.comment: A placeholder is a number of non-prioritised leagues. So like "18 other are playing now". This is a list of leagues with ongoing matches.

accessibility_privacy_policy.comment: A link to the Privacy policy of the app

accessibility_qualeuropaconffinalstage.comment: This is in indication that this team will qualify directly to the Conference League playoff stage. This is the 3rd place in the Europa league that gets this playoff place.

accessibility_roundof64.comment: Label indicating it is the round of 64. 64 teams are left in the tournament. Round of 64 is the same as 32th-finals.

accessibility_search_result_header.comment: Text shown on top of the search results page. Input is the search text.

accessibility_shot_blocked.comment: A shot was blocked by a defender. An attacker shot the ball at goal but a defender blocked it.

accessibility_shot_blocks.comment: NUmber of times a defender has blocked a shot by standing in it's path when the other team has a shot at goal.

accessibility_successful_dribbles.comment: Number of successful dribbles for a player in a season

accessibility_successful_passes.comment: Number of passes for a player in a season

accessibility_successful_passes_accuracy.comment: Pass accuracy of a player in a match measured in percent

accessibility_sync_calendar_button_text.comment: Text shown on a button that lets the user add a teams matches to their calendar.

accessibility_sync_to_calendar_descripti.comment: Text shown in a panel that lets the user add a team's fixtures to the calendar. Input is the team name and the team short name, eg: Sync Manchester United'sMan United's fixtures to your favorite calendar app. (The code will show either the team name or the short name depending on screen size)
accessibility_sync_to_calendar_descripti.value: Sync %1$@'s%2$@'s fixtures to your favorite calendar app.

accessibility_sync_to_calendar_descripti.comment: Same as sync_to_calendar_description, but without html tags. Input is the team name, eg: Sync Liverpool's fixtures to your favorite calendar app.
accessibility_sync_to_calendar_descripti.value: Sync %1$@'s fixtures to your favorite calendar app.

accessibility_team_of_the_week.comment: Header text for the Team of the week panel.

accessibility_team_score.comment: Translate same as player_scores. Some languages has a different translation of team vs player score.

accessibility_terms_of_use.comment: Text shown for the link to the terms of use document.

accessibility_top_leagues.comment: Text shown as the header for a list of the top leagues.

accessibility_total_passes.comment: Total amount of passes. Includes both accurate and missed passes.

accessibility_touches_opp_box.comment: Number of touches a player has in the opposition box

accessibility_trending_news.comment: Header text for slider with the top 5 trending news stories.

accessibility_unknown.comment: Unknown - Used when we don't know a players position.

common_access_calendar_needed.value: You need to grant FotMob access to the Calendar to be able to add the match to the calendar

common_add_favorite_desc.value: Tap + to add a favourite team

common_add_favorites_news_hint.comment: A hint for the user to add more favorites to get more news sources in the News page. Make sure that "Add news" part is inside .. tags. Also, add linebreak (\n) roughly in the middle of the comment

common_added_as_favorite.comment: Status label saying that the player/team has been added as a favorite

common_all.comment: Onboarding: header for all non-top players list

common_all_events.comment: Option in Notification Settings to enable/disable all events at once for player/team/match/etc.

common_assist.comment: Shown in match facts when a player got an assist for a goal

common_assists.comment: Header for top lists of the player with mosts assists

common_cancelled_short.comment: Short version of the translation of [cancelled]. Max 2 chars.

common_centerback.comment: Player position - player plays in the center back

common_choose_rss.value: Select which news feed to display for the currently chosen league

common_clean_sheet.comment: Keeper has kept a clean sheet, he has not let in any goals

common_commentary_feature_description2.value: Audio stream starts about 5 min before the match.

common_commentary_feature_description3.value: It might take up to 30 seconds before audio is audible after pressing play.

common_commentary_feature_description4.value: Feedback on commentaries are very welcome!

common_commentary_not_started.value: The audio commentary starts about 5 minutes before the match. Please try again later.

common_conceded_penalties.comment: Label for number of penalties a player has caused in the match.

common_contract.comment: Label for player's contract expiration date with club

common_contract_extension.comment: Transfer status: player extended his contract with club

common_deselect_favorite_message.value: Do you want to deselect your favourite league?

common_deselect_favorites_message.value: Do you want to deselect your favourite leagues?

common_draw.comment: Vote on an outcome of a match. This is the match will end in a draw option

common_edit_match_alerts.comment: Button caption for changing alerts for all teams. Please keep this short as possible

common_empty_placeholder_no_my_matches.comment: Empty placeholder for live matches, if there're no my matches (favorited, alerted, etc.)

common_enable_push_question.value: Do you want to enable push notifications?

common_enable_tv_schedules.comment: Settings item to enable/disable TV Guide

common_error_adding_match_to_calendar.value: Error adding match to calendar, this feature works only on Android 4.x

common_error_occured.value: An error occurred, please retry the operation

common_error_push.value: Error registering push notification, please try again

common_error_push_not_enabled.value: Notifications are disabled for FotMob in your Notification Centre. Visit http://fotmob.com/faq.html to resolve this.

common_errors_led_to_goal.comment: A label for number of errors a player has made that resulted in a goal for the opposition

common_euro2016_onboarding_desc_line2.value: Setup alerts for top players and teams

common_euro2016_setup_national_team.comment: Onboarding: asking the user to setup their favorite national team

common_europa_conference_league.comment: This is a brand new league by UEFA. Details here:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Europa_Conference_League

common_filter.comment: Noun, used for describing a menu option

common_filter_tv_schedule.comment: Page header for TV Guide filter

common_firstrun_select_teams_to_follow.comment: Description label to explain the concept of following in the onboarding of the app (first thing user sees after installing the app)
common_firstrun_select_teams_to_follow.value: Select your favourite clubs and national teams to follow

common_free_transfer.comment: Label for free transfer in Transfers view

common_goals_from_bench.comment: It is goals a player has scored when he began the match as a substitute

common_international.comment: Label for international tournaments’ headers in Live Matches

common_keeper_sweeper.comment: Keeper cleared the ball outside the penalty area, acting as a sweeper

common_latest_transfers.comment: Header for list of latest transfers

common_league_has_notifications.value: The league has enabled notifications, you must turn off alerts via the Filter menu in Matches tab

common_loan_return.comment: Transfer status: player returned from loan

common_local.comment: A tab-switcher to switch between "Local" teams (from your region) and "Suggested" ones (from across the globe)

common_man_of_the_match.comment: A title indicating that this player was the best player.

common_matches_not_determined.comment: Placeholder for brackets rounds, which have not been drawen yet
common_matches_not_determined.value: Next round matches are yet to be determined

common_message_sent.value: Tip: Long press a goal or other event to share it.

common_no_favorite_leagues.comment: Profile page - placeholder's text if there're no favorite leagues

common_no_favorite_players.comment: Profile page - placeholder's text if there're no favorite players

common_no_favorite_teams.comment: Profile page - placeholder's text if there're no favorite teams

common_no_results_for_query.comment: Onboarding: not players found for the query

common_no_team_info.value: Sorry, we do not have any info on this team

common_no_tv_guid.comment: Empty placeholder if there's no matches available on TV

common_not_native_language.comment: A message saying we don't have the live ticker in the users language. Like we may have the ticker in German while the user only speaks English.
common_not_native_language.value: Sorry but we don't have this commentary in your language

common_notification_description.value: Adjust volume of score notifications and change when to show notifications. Change timezone.

common_on_loan_transfers.comment: Transfer status: player moved on loan

common_onboarding_favorites.comment: Welcome message that informs users that they can see all their favorite players and teams in this part of the app
common_onboarding_favorites.value: Welcome! You can follow all your favourites here.

common_onboarding_league.comment: A popup showing an invite to get ready for an upcoming tournament
common_onboarding_league.value: Follow %@ and get updates from your favourite teams and players.

common_onboarding_players_help_infromati.comment: Help text to explain why they should follow a favorite player
common_onboarding_players_help_infromati.value: Select your favourite players and get notified for goals, red cards, missed penalties and more

common_onboarding_team_help_infromation.comment: Help text to explain onboarding for users
common_onboarding_team_help_infromation.value: Select your national team to receive updates of upcoming matches, goals and more

common_onboarding_world_cup_card_calltoa.comment: In the live-matches, there will be a promo-card asking user to go through the onboarding for the World Cup. This is the label for the call to action

common_onboarding_world_cup_card_descrip.comment: In the live-matches, there will be a promo-card asking user to go through the onboarding for the World Cup. This is the description of the card
common_onboarding_world_cup_card_descrip.value: Set Alerts for your favourite teams and players with our brand new FotMob World Cup mode.

common_points.comment: SHORT abbrevation for "points". Used in e.g. top of table column, so should use "start case".

common_points_lowercase_abbreviation.comment: SHORT abbrevation for "points". Used after a number, so should use "mid-sentence case".

common_rate_fotmob_desc.value: Do you like FotMob? It would mean a lot to us if you took a minute to rate it!

common_resync_desc.value: If you have previously bought gold or silver, click here

common_roundof32.comment: Label indicating it is the round of 32. 32 teams are left in the tournament. Round of 32 is the same as 16th-finals

common_saved_penalties.comment: Label for number of penalties a keeper has saved in a match

common_search_hint.value: Type in the teamname you are looking for

common_secondary_onboarding_teams_body.comment: Explanation to the user why he should add more favorite teams and players. @
common_secondary_onboarding_teams_body.value: Select favourite teams and players for a faster, customized experience.

common_secondary_onboarding_teams_header.comment: Question asking the user to add some favorite teams and players.
common_secondary_onboarding_teams_header.value: Make it easy to follow your favourites

common_see_all_matches.comment: Help button to jump from Play Off to Matches tab in league overview

common_silver_desc.value: Remove ads for a year. Click for details

common_sort_explained.value: Drag the competitions in the order you want in the live window or select them and use the buttons to create your preferred sorting

common_stream_playback_error.value: An error occurred playing the audio stream

common_suggested.comment: Onboarding: header for the top players list

common_team_has_notifications.value: One of the team has enabled alerts, you must turn off alerts via the team page

common_third_place.comment: Small-label below the bronze-match. Keep it short!

common_transfer_center.comment: The Transfer Center is a place where we list all the player transfers between teams.

common_transfer_enable_all.value: Do you want to receive customized transfer alerts for your favourite teams and leagues?

common_transfer_sum.comment: Transfer sum. Label just before the amount the player was transferred for. Example: "Transfer $10.000.000"

common_turn_off_favorite_league_pling.value: You have to turn off notifications for favourite teams (long press the "Favourite teams" header) to toggle the notification status on this match

common_two_legged_tie.comment: Header for popup for aggregated play-off matches

common_undisclosed.comment: Transfer price is unknown (undisclosed by clubs)

common_welcome_transfer_center.comment: A welcome message for user visiting the Transfer Center for the first time. The Transfer Center is a place where we list all the player transfers between teams.

common_when_phone_is_set_to_vibrate.value: When phone is set to vibrate

common_widget_empty_text.value: No starred matches or matches with alerts today

common_yesterday.comment: <string name="sponsor_desc">Get rid of the ads by downloading other FREE apps</string>

ios_Advanced.comment: This is used as a header for advanced settings in the settings menu

ios_Matches_and_News.comment: Header for a team where matches is the matches the team has played and news is the team news

ios_Rank.comment: Do not use more than 5 characters! There is little room in the GUI for this string

ios_Sorting.comment: Menuchoice to change the sortorder of the leagues

ios_buy_premium_first.value: You must buy premium version first

ios_change.comment: Menuchoice for changing the current league

ios_choose_league_desc.value: Add a star to your favourite leagues for easy access. Click the league name to change the current league

ios_last_matches.comment: Header for a teams last played matches.

ios_location_reason.value: We only use your location to enable features available to some countries

ios_purchase_failed.value: The purchase failed, please try again

ios_push_sent.comment: Text that appears after the user has requested a test score message

ios_top_assists.comment: Top lists of the players with most assists

ios_tweet_text.comment: A text to send to twitter for sharing the app
ios_tweet_text.value: FotMob - the best livescores app for football/soccer

ios_whoops_no_matches.value: Whoops, no matches! Add a notification or a star to a match to make it appear here

new_bracket.comment: This is the World Cup bracket. Like this http://cdn.bleacherreport.net/images_root/article/media_slots/photos/001/240/770/KnockoutRoundBracket_original.jpg?1386355815

new_choose_favorite_team.comment: Header in screen where user can choose the top football teams

new_choose_favorite_team_national.comment: Header in screen where user can choose a local team

new_city_guides.comment: Videos from the World Cup citys

new_correction.comment: Information message if we have sent some wrong info earlier and now we send a correction message

new_default_sound.comment: Indicates that the user has the default sound set

new_dismiss.comment: User is prompted for an action in a dialog and this is the cancel button

new_edit_alerts.comment: Short button caption for changing alerts for a specific team. Please keep this as short as possible

new_explanation.comment: Dialog asking explaining the user that we send news notifications for his favorite team.
new_explanation.value: We send hand-picked news notifications for the teams below. Click OK to enable news alerts and stay up-to-date.

new_favorite_summary.value: Review your favourite teams and set alerts

new_full_time_result.comment: Indicates that the user wants an alert when the match is at full time

new_goals_start_and_finish.comment: Title of dialog where user can toggle alerts on a specific team. So he can set alerts og goals, match start and match finished

new_h2h.comment: This is a header for team vs team stats

new_how_to_remove_news_notifications.comment: User can open the team page in the app and click the bell icon to remove news alerts
new_how_to_remove_news_notifications.value: Toggle news notifications by clicking the bell in the team page

new_intro_text.comment: Text shown at splash screen. Please keep it not very much longer than the english original text.
new_intro_text.value: Select your favourite teams and start the experience.

new_invitation_message.comment: Make a nice message to invite friends. Important! MAX 100 chars!
new_invitation_message.value: I am using this app to get live football scores. Check it out!

new_invite_informal_prompt.comment: Try keep this short! Message asking the user to share FotMob with his friends. Must be in an inviting user that makes the user likely to click and share the app.
new_invite_informal_prompt.value: Your friends may be missing out, share FotMob with them now?

new_invite_title.value: Invite your friends to try FotMob

new_lineup_confirmed.comment: Information message that the lineup for an upcoming match is confirmed

new_login_with.comment: Header asking the users to log in with Facebook or Google+

new_match_alerts.comment: Notifications sent for a football match.

new_match_reminder.comment: Indicates that the user wants a reminder before the game starts

new_match_start.comment: Indicates that the user wants alerts for the start of the match

new_mute_alerts.comment: Short button caption for turning off alerts for a specific match. Please keep this as short as possible

new_news_vibrate.comment: User can decide if his phone should vibrate when getting a news alert

new_no_favorites_added.comment: Message at the end of a flow informing the user he didn't choose anything. The text has a newline seperator in it.
new_no_favorites_added.value: You didn't add any favourites.\n\nPress back to add one now or press finish and add one later.

new_no_matches_on_tv_today.comment: A info message saying that there are no football matches on TV today

new_no_more_goals.comment: This is in the betting section where the user can bet on that there will be no more goals scored in the match

new_no_player_data.value: Nothing here yet, check back later

new_notification_sound_fav_opponent.comment: it is in the notification settings where you can choose a sound for the goal of an opponent to your favorite team

new_optional.comment: Text indicating that the field is not required to be filled out, so the field is optional

new_pause_result.comment: Indicates that the user wants alerts when the game is paused at half time

new_pick_favorite.value: We noticed you have no favourite teams set. Do you want to set one now?

new_player_not_sent_off.comment: Information message if we have mistakenly informed of a red card earlier, this is a correction message

new_player_sent_off.comment: Information message that a player has received a red card

new_quick_start.comment: Short button caption at splash screen.

new_red_card.comment: Information message that a player has received a red card

new_red_card_alert.comment: Indicates that the user wants an alert when a player receives a red card

new_roundof16.comment: Used to describe the knockout stage with 16 teams remaining. Often translated as '1/8 finals' or 'eighth-finals' in some languages.

new_score_correction.comment: Information message if we have mistakenly informed of a wrong score earlier, this is a correction message

new_set_alerts.comment: Dialog title indicating that the user can set team alerts in this dialog

new_set_your_popular_teams.value: Do you follow one of these popular teams?

new_set_your_teams.comment: Informing the user that he can choose his favorite local team(s)

new_sing_up.comment: Button that user clicks when finished registering his details and he wants to register/sign up

new_skip.comment: Button caption for skipping to the next screen

new_sounds.comment: Heading for the sounds that you can choose when getting alerts for goals, cards ++

new_sounds_desc.value: Change notification sound for the alerts

new_standings.comment: Tables. topscorers and assist is behind this menu choice.

new_start_and_finish.comment: Indicates that the user wants alerts for the start and end of the match

new_teams.comment: Plural form of Team, header of the list of world cup teams

new_to_win.comment: Header where we display the odds to win the entire World Cup 2014. Keep short!

new_transfer_news_added.value: We will only send you alerts for the top transfer news

new_view.comment: Call to action label on a button to view more details about the message being displayed at the screen

notifications_add_favorite_desc_ipad.comment: Prompt to ask user to add a favorite team or player by clicking a button with "+" in it
notifications_add_favorite_desc_ipad.value: Tap + to add a favourite team or player

notifications_added_injury_time.comment: NB! It's still in use for AW & Android String indicating how many minutes of injury time is added when minutes is 1

notifications_alert_card_removed.value: Correction: %@%@ did not receive a red card\n%@

notifications_alert_goal.comment: Alert for a goal. Ahead of the Goal will be the elapsed time. So it will read: "Team A 1-0 Team B\n65' Goal!"

notifications_alert_goal_scorer_penalty.comment: Goal was scored on a penalty

notifications_alert_score.comment: Alert for a goal. Ahead of the Goal will be the elapsed time. So it will read: "Team A 1-0 Team B\n65' Goal!"

notifications_are_you_enjoying_app_varia.value: Hi %@! Do you enjoy using FotMob?

notifications_at_least_one.comment: An error message informing user that he has to pick at least one of the alert options (goals, penalties, half time ++)
notifications_at_least_one.value: You must select at least one alert

notifications_career.comment: A tab label indicating that in it we will show which clubs the player has played for before in his career. Also uses the same header for Coaches indicating which clubs he has coached in his career.

notifications_clearances.comment: A defensive clearance – where a player under pressure kicks the ball clear of the defensive zone or/and out of play

notifications_crosses.comment: Stat for the number of crosses in the match

notifications_disable_dnd_to_hear_notifi.comment: Shown when user has enabled DND, but wants to hear notifications
notifications_disable_dnd_to_hear_notifi.value: Disable "Do not disturb" mode to hear notification sounds.

notifications_disable_push.value: Are you sure? You should only do this if you experience problems with the notifications.

notifications_discipline.comment: Header for stats like cards and fouls

notifications_dispossessed.comment: Stat indication how many times a player lost the ball to an opponent (was Dispossessed)

notifications_distribution.comment: Header for stats regarding passes, long balls, crosses and chances created in the match

notifications_do_not_disturb.comment: Button with shortcut to system settings

notifications_duel_lost.comment: Duel over the possession of the ball where a player looses the ball

notifications_duel_won.comment: Duel over the possession of the ball where a player wins the ball

notifications_duels.comment: Stat for the number of duels that the player has been involved in during the match

notifications_error_signing_in_with.value: There was a problem signing in with %@. Please try again.

notifications_error_unable_to_toggle_fav.comment: (Uncommon) error message used if there were to be some problems with the data returned from search result that makes it impossible to toggle a league/team/player as favorite
notifications_error_unable_to_toggle_fav.value: Unable toggle favourite. Please try again later.

notifications_favorite_players.comment: A header for a list of favorite players that the user has chosen

notifications_how_about_rating.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short
notifications_how_about_rating.value: How about rating us on the Play Store?

notifications_how_about_rating_iOS.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short
notifications_how_about_rating_iOS.value: How about rating us on the App Store?

notifications_increase_volume_to_hear_no.comment: Shown when the user has muted the notifications
notifications_increase_volume_to_hear_no.value: Please increase the alert volume to hear notification sounds.

notifications_increase_volume_to_preview.comment: Shown when user has muted the media
notifications_increase_volume_to_preview.value: Please increase the media volume to hear the preview of the sound.

notifications_is_in_lineup.comment: A user can get an alert if the player is in the lineup that will start the match. Can be either sub or as the starting 11.

notifications_key_players.comment: Header for the most important players in the match

notifications_live.comment: Describing TV listings sending a match live

notifications_logged_out_warning.comment: Message telling that the user that has been signed out (probably by the auth provider) and that the user must do a new sign in to have everything safely backed up. It may be useful looking at the translation for the "sign_in_dialog" string.
notifications_logged_out_warning.value: You have been logged out. Please log in again so that we can continue keeping your favourites and settings safe.

notifications_long_balls.comment: Stat for long balls during the match

notifications_long_balls_accurate.comment: Long balls that are accurate (to a player on his own team)

notifications_matches_started.comment: Header for a number indication how many matches the player has started out of a total. Like "Matches started 27/30".

notifications_minutes_played.comment: How many minutes the player has been on field

notifications_no_variant_2.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short

notifications_notifications_2.comment: Button with shortcut to system settings

notifications_notifications_are_blocked.value: - Notifications for this app have been disabled

notifications_notifications_count.comment: Status string indication how many favorites you got and how many with notifications

notifications_notifications_may_not_be_h.value: Notifications may currently not be heard and/or seen because:

notifications_ok_sure.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short

notifications_player_in_starting_lineup.comment: A user can get an alert if the player is in the lineup. "Wayne Rooney is in starting lineup. Manchester United - Liverpool

notifications_player_starts_on_the_bench.comment: A user can get an alert if the player is on the bench at the start of the match. "Wayne Rooney is starting as a substitute. Manchester United - Liverpool

notifications_player_throws.comment: Goalkeeper throws or throw-ins from the side. We use the same translation for both.

notifications_playoff.comment: tab-title for brackets view in League overview

notifications_position.comment: Label for a field indication which position the player plays in. Forward/defender/attacker og goalkeeper. Try to keep it short.

notifications_punches.comment: Indicates that the keeper has punched the ball on a cross

notifications_receive_confirmed_transfer.value: Receive confirmed transfer alerts for all of your favourite teams

notifications_saves.comment: Stat for the number of keeper saves in the match

notifications_set_at_least_one_match_ale.comment: Short message telling user to check at least one of the checkboxes for match alerts
notifications_set_at_least_one_match_ale.value: Set at least one match alert.

notifications_set_standard_notifications.comment: A menu choice asking the user to set a list of standard notifications for matches

notifications_shirt.comment: Label for a field indication which shirtnumber the player plays has. Try to keep it short.

notifications_shots.comment: Header for stats for the shots in the game

notifications_shots_detail.comment: Header for detailed stats about the shots in the game

notifications_shots_inside_box.comment: Stat for shots taken inside the penalty area

notifications_shots_outside_box.comment: Stat for shots taken outside the penalty area

notifications_shots_woodwork.comment: Stat for shots hitting the woodwork on the goal (post or bar)

notifications_sign_in_dialog.value: We can keep your favorites and settings safe. Sign in now?

notifications_social_media_updates.comment: A user can choose to get alerts for Twitter & Instagram updates for a player

notifications_standard_alerts_applied_me.comment: Info message that informs user that we have added the standard alerts to the match between two teams. The standard alerts are a set of alerts that the user has defined in settings like Goals, Red Cards, Penalties and so on.

notifications_standard_alerts_descriptio.value: Set the standard notifications for any new league, match or team alerts that are set. This does not affect existing alerts.

notifications_status_live.comment: Status indicator for match highlights. Says the match is ongoing.

notifications_time_setting_may_be_incorr.value: Both the time and time zone setting may be incorrect.

notifications_time_settings.comment: Button that open time and date settings on the device

notifications_timezone_and_time_warning_.comment: The first argument is the name of the timezone, the last two is the time of day.
notifications_timezone_and_time_warning_.value: The timezone is set to %1$@. Either the time zone should be changed or the time should probably be set to %2$@ and not %3$@.

notifications_top_stats.comment: Header for the most important stats in the game

notifications_trending_favorites_are_hid.comment: Short "snackbar" telling user that the trending favourites teams/players/leagues have been hidden.

notifications_view_player_details.comment: Button caption for viewing more details about a player

notifications_volume.comment: Button with shortcut to system settings

notifications_warning.comment: Header of card warning user about incorrect user

notifications_was_fouled.comment: Statistic indicating that the player was fouled by another player and given a free-kick

notifications_watch_match_bet365.comment: Button label for watching the match on Bet365.com. Try to not write this much longer than the English original text as it needs to fit one line!
notifications_watch_match_bet365.value: Watch the match on Bet365 TV

notifications_we_added_confirmed_transfe.value: We've added confirmed transfer alerts! Do you want to turn them on for your favourite teams?

notifications_we_can_keep_your_settings_.value: We can keep your settings safe so you can sync them across devices or retrieve them when you get a new device.

notifications_would_you_mind_giving_feed.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short
notifications_would_you_mind_giving_feed.value: Would you mind giving us some feedback?

notifications_yes_variant_2.comment: Used for rating dialog, button label so keep it short

notifications_your_content_has_never_bee.value: Your content has not been synced yet. Please sign out and in again if the problem persists.

seo_a_short_description_of_the_issue.comment: Used as placeholder in the troubleshooting mail.
seo_a_short_description_of_the_issue.value: A short description of the issue

seo_about_the_match.comment: Heading for a text describing the match. Time, location, who is involved etc

seo_bug.comment: Used for radio button in troubleshooting mail for choosing type of issue. And as a description for mail.

seo_describe_your_issue.comment: Used for title in troubleshooting mail.

seo_expires_in.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription is expiring. From 0 to many days. Use "today" and "tomorrow" for 0 and 1 if that makes sense for that language.

seo_feedback.comment: Used for radio button in troubleshooting mail for choosing type of issue. And as a description for mail.

seo_friendly_match.comment: Text explaining that the the current match is a friendly match that does not count towards any trophies or prices.

seo_h2h_first_time.comment: Text explainging that this is the first time the teams have played each other.
seo_h2h_first_time.value: This is the first time the teams are playing against each other.

seo_h2h_summary.comment: Text summarisng the outcomes of the previous matches between the two teams. With parameters in order; home team name, number of home team wins, away team name, number of away team wins and number or draws.
seo_h2h_summary.value: The current head to head record for the teams are %1$@ %2$@ win(s), %3$@ %4$@ win(s), and %5$@ draw(s).

seo_help.comment: Used for mail description in troubleshooting mail

seo_i_need_help.comment: Used for radio button in troubleshooting mail for choosing type of issue.

seo_league_match.comment: Text explaining that the the current match is a match in the given league or competition.

seo_league_match_round.comment: Text explaining that the the current match is a match in the given round or stage in the given league or competition. Eg. "This is round 12 of the Eliteserien."

seo_newsletter.comment: A header indicating you can sign up for a newsletter where we send emails to the user about football things.

seo_odds_close_match.comment: Text stating that there are no out and out favorite in the match between the two teams. The team names as input.
seo_odds_close_match.value: The bookmakers predict a close match between %1$@ and %2$@.

seo_odds_favorites.comment: Text stating that a given team is the favorite to win the match according to the bookmakers. With the team name of the favourit as input.
seo_odds_favorites.value: %1$@ are the favorites to win the match, according to the bookmakers.

seo_odds_overview.comment: Text describing the odds of the different outcomes of a match. With the following parameters in order; home team name, odds of home win, odds of draw, odds of away win, away team name
seo_odds_overview.value: %1$@ have odds of %2$@ to win, %3$@ for a draw, and %4$@ for %5$@ to win.

seo_odds_x.comment: Used for the betting slip to show the odds of your current selected bets.

seo_offerings_prematch.comment: Explaining what features will be availalbe on the fotmob site, and when.
seo_offerings_prematch.value: Predicted lineups are available for the match a few days in advance while the actual lineup will be available about an hour ahead of the match.

seo_penalty_shootout_miss.comment: Used in notifications to indicate that a team missed a penalty during a penalty shootout event, such as "Arsenal miss! (penalty shootout)."

seo_penalty_shootout_v2.comment: Used in notifications for indicating penalty shootout like "Arsenal scores! (penalty shootout)".

seo_play_offs.comment: Button title as a header for the Champions League playoffs. This is matches that decide who will progress to the Round of 16.

seo_play_offs_draw.comment: Label as a header for the matches that will be part of a random draw which will decide which teams meet each other in the play off matches.

seo_play_offs_explanation.comment: A description of the new draw format used in Champions League, Europa League and Conference League. Please keep the \n placements in the English string when doing the translation.
seo_play_offs_explanation.value: The play-off matchups are determined by a draw. In each grouping, the two teams on the left are drawn against the two teams on the right to create two play-off matchups. The play-offs are played over two legs, with the winner going to the round of 16.\n\nThere is a separate draw for the round of 16 using the same process.

seo_player_started_matches.comment: Label below the number of matches a player has been part of starting eleven. Keep short.

seo_playing_home.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at a given time.

seo_playing_home_at_stadium.comment: Text explaining that the first team is playing at home against the visiting team at the given statium at a given time.
seo_playing_home_at_stadium.value: %1$@ is playing home against %2$@ at %3$@ on %4$@.

seo_predict_onboarding_apps.comment: Text in onboarding of our predictor game. The placeholder is a league name like "Women's EURO 2025" so the complete string in English will be "Predict Women's EURO 2025 results and compete against friends in leagues!". If the word "Predict" sounds weird in your language, please use "Guess" as a replacement.
seo_predict_onboarding_apps.value: Predict %@ results and compete against friends in leagues!

seo_predictor_play_button.comment: Button label for starting the predictor game. Must be short and clearly signal the action of predicting match results.

seo_renews_in.comment: Used to indicate when the subscription will renew. From 0 to many days. Use "today" and "tomorrow" for 0 and 1 if that makes sense for that language.

seo_save.comment: Outcome after a shot that indicates that the keeper made a save

seo_site_description.comment: This is overall description to be shown in search results on the web etc
seo_site_description.value: FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.

seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.comment: Meta description for the fotmob website about careers, where open postitions are listed
seo_site_description_aboutus_careers.value: We are looking for developers, check out our open positions! FotMob is the essential app for matchday. Get live scores, fixtures, tables, match stats, and personalised news from over 500 football leagues around the world.

seo_site_description_faq.comment: Meta description tag value for FAQ page, with questions and anwsers to frequently asked questions.
seo_site_description_faq.value: Have a question about FotMob, app settings or stats definitions? Check out FotMob's Frequently Asked Questions page for answers and other pro tips!

seo_site_description_for_you.comment: Meta description text for the For You news page.
seo_site_description_for_you.value: Create a personalized news feed with breaking news from your favorite clubs and leagues.

seo_site_description_latest_news.comment: Meta description text for the Latest News page.
seo_site_description_latest_news.value: Get the latest news, headlines and transfer rumours from the Premier League and world football.

seo_site_description_league_matches.comment: Description for the page showing the past and future matches in a league. With the name, and season as input.

seo_site_description_league_news.comment: Description for the page with the lates news and rumors around a single league or tournament. With name of said league or tournament as input.
seo_site_description_league_news.value: Get the latest %1$@ news and transfer rumours.

seo_site_description_league_overview.comment: Description for the page for a single league or tournament. Containing tables, matches, news and stats for the league. With the league name, and season name as input. Eg "Premier League matches, tables and news 2021/2022"
seo_site_description_league_overview.value: %1$@ table %2$@, results, fixtures, top scorers and more

seo_site_description_league_playoff.comment: Description for the page showing the playoff tree or bracket for the the given league. With the name, and season as input.

seo_site_description_league_stats.comment: Description for the page listing stats for a league. Eg: "Premier League stats 2023/2024 including top scorers, assists, player ratings, and more"
seo_site_description_league_stats.value: %1$@ stats %2$@ including top scorers, assists, player ratings, and more

seo_site_description_league_table.comment: Description for the page with the table and standings for the the given league. With the name, and season as input.
seo_site_description_league_table.value: %1$@ table %2$@, standings, form guide, and more.

seo_site_description_league_transfers.comment: Description for the page with the lates transfers to and from clubs playing in the given league. With the name of the league as input.

seo_site_description_match.comment: This is overall description on a match page before the match starts. To be shown in search results on the web etc
seo_site_description_match.value: %1$@ vs %2$@ on %3$@. Check live results, H2H, match stats, lineups, player ratings, insights, team forms, shotmap, and highlights.

seo_site_description_match_finished.comment: This is overall description on a match page after the match has ended. To be shown in search results on the web etc
seo_site_description_match_finished.value: %1$@ vs %2$@ on %3$@ ended %4$@. Check live results, H2H, match stats, lineups, player ratings, insights, team forms, shotmap, and highlights.

seo_site_description_stats_league.comment: Page description for page showing teams or players in a league, sorted by a single stat. With stat, leaguename and seasonname as input. Eg "Assists - LaLiga 2023/2024 stats"
seo_site_description_stats_league.value: %1$@ %2$@ stats including top scorers, assists, player ratings, and more

seo_site_description_stats_team.comment: Page description for page showing players on a team, sorted by a single stat. With stat, teamname, leaguename and seasonname as input. Eg "Expected goals (xG) - Barcelona stats for LaLiga 2023/2024"
seo_site_description_stats_team.value: %1$@ stats for %2$@ %3$@ including top scorers, assists, player ratings, and more

seo_site_description_team_fixtures.comment: Meta description tag value for the team fixtures page, with both future and past matches and results.

seo_site_description_team_history.comment: Description for the page showing a teams historical table positions and trophies won.

seo_site_description_team_news.comment: Description for the page with the lates news and rumors conserning the given team or its players and staff.
seo_site_description_team_news.value: Get the latest %1$@ news and transfer rumours

seo_site_description_team_overview.comment: Description for the page for a team or club. With the teams fixtures, standings, transfers, news, top players etc. With the name as input.
seo_site_description_team_overview.value: %1$@ - results, fixtures, latest news and standings

seo_site_description_team_squad.comment: Description for the page listing the teams squad including the coach. With injuries and position listed.

seo_site_description_team_stats.comment: Title for the page showing stats for a team.
seo_site_description_team_stats.value: %1$@ - team rating, goals per match, shots on target and other stats

seo_site_description_team_table.comment: Description for the page with the table and standings for a team in different leagues and tournaments.
seo_site_description_team_table.value: %1$@ - league and cup standings and form guide

seo_site_description_team_transfers.comment: Description for the page for a team or clubs transfer history. Showing players transfered in or out. With the name or the team as input.
seo_site_description_team_transfers.value: Latest %1$@ transfers in, out and contract extensions

seo_site_description_transfer_center.comment: Meta description tag value for the transfer center page
seo_site_description_transfer_center.value: Find all latest confirmed transfers & most expensive signings. FotMob Transfer Center - filter by league & teams. Stay updated on transfers with live updates on deadline day with all completed deals!

seo_site_description_transfer_center_sel.comment: Meta description tag value for the transfer center page showing only transfers for a spesific team or league. With the name of said team or league as input with %1$@ as placeholder.
seo_site_description_transfer_center_sel.value: %1$@ latest confirmed transfers & most expensive signings. FotMob Transfer Center - filter by league & teams. Stay updated on transfers with live updates on deadline day with all completed deals!

seo_site_title.comment: Title of the site. Typically displayed in the tab header in the browser

seo_site_title_aboutus.comment: Website meta title for the fotmob about us page

seo_site_title_aboutus_careers.comment: Meta title for the fotmob website about careers, where open postitions are listed

seo_site_title_coach.comment: Title for the page for a coach. With name as input. Eg "Frank Lampard - stats and career"

seo_site_title_faq.comment: Meta title tag value for FAQ page, with questions and anwsers to frequently asked questions.

seo_site_title_for_you.comment: Title of the For You news page. Typically displayed in the tab header in the browser.
seo_site_title_for_you.value: News - For You - personalized news feed

seo_site_title_latest_news.comment: Title of the Latest News page. Typically displayed in the tab header in the browser.
seo_site_title_latest_news.value: Latest News - Today's football news and transfer rumours.

seo_site_title_league_matches.comment: Title for the page showing the past and future matches in a league. With the name, and season as input.

seo_site_title_league_news.comment: Headline for news about a league and the teams in the league. Include the league name in the title, with %1$@ as placeholder.

seo_site_title_league_overview.comment: Title for the page for a single league or tournament. Containing tables, matches, news and stats for the league. With the league name, and season name as input. Eg "Premier League matches, tables and news 2021/2022"

seo_site_title_league_playoff.comment: Title for the page showing the playoff tree or bracket for the the given league. With the name, and season as input.

seo_site_title_league_stats_players.comment: Title for the page listing the top three players in the league based on different stats. With the league name and season given as input. Eg. "Premier League 2022/2023 top rated players, goals, assists and other stats"
seo_site_title_league_stats_players.value: %1$@ %2$@ top rated players, goals, assists and other stats

seo_site_title_league_stats_teams.comment: Title for the page listing the top three teams in the league based on different stats. With the league name and season given as input. Eg. "Premier League 2022/2023 top rated teams, goals per match, shots on target and other stats"
seo_site_title_league_stats_teams.value: %1$@ %2$@ top rated teams, goals per match, shots on target and other stats

seo_site_title_league_stats_trophies.comment: Title when listing previous winners and runners up in the league. League name as input with %1€@ as placeholder. Eg. "Premier League winners and runner-ups"

seo_site_title_league_table.comment: Headline for the league table. Include league name as %1$@ and year indicator as %2$@. Eg "Premier League table 2021/2022, form and next opponent"

seo_site_title_league_transfers.comment: Title for the page with the lates transfers to and from clubs playing in the given league. With the name of the league as input.

seo_site_title_match.comment: Title of the match page. Typically displayed in the tab header in the browser
seo_site_title_match.value: %1$@ vs %2$@ - live score, predicted lineups and H2H stats

seo_site_title_player.comment: Title for the page for a player. With name as input. Eg "Frank Lampard - stats, career and market value"

seo_site_title_stats.comment: Meta title for stats page with list of stats for players
seo_site_title_stats.value: Stats - FotMob - The Pulse of Football

seo_site_title_stats_league.comment: Page title for page showing teams or players in a league, sorted by a single stat. With stat, leaguename and seasonname as input. Eg "Assists - LaLiga 2023/2024 stats"

seo_site_title_stats_team.comment: Page title for page showing players on a team, sorted by a single stat. With stat, teamname, leaguename and seasonname as input. Eg "Expected goals (xG) - Barcelona stats for LaLiga 2023/2024"

seo_site_title_team_fixtures.comment: Meta title tag value for the team fixtures page, with both future and past matches and results.
seo_site_title_team_fixtures.value: %1$@ - latest matches, scores and upcoming fixtures

seo_site_title_team_history.comment: Title for the page showing a teams historical table positions and trophies won.

seo_site_title_team_news.comment: Title for the page with the lates news and rumors conserning the given team or its players and staff.

seo_site_title_team_overview.comment: Title for the page for a team or club. With the teams fixtures, standings, transfers, news, top players etc. With the name as input.
seo_site_title_team_overview.value: %1$@ - fixtures, team info and top players

seo_site_title_team_squad.comment: Title for the page listing the teams squad including the coach. With injuries and position listed.

seo_site_title_team_stats.comment: Title for the page showing stats for the teams squad. The teams top scorer, assists etc.
seo_site_title_team_stats.value: %1$@ - top rated players, goals, assists and other stats- stats, career and market value

seo_site_title_team_stats_teams.comment: Title for the page showing stats for the entire team compared to other teams. What teams have scored the most goals, keept most clean sheets etc.
seo_site_title_team_stats_teams.value: %1$@ - team rating, goals per match, shots on target and other stats

seo_site_title_team_table.comment: Headline for the table showing a teams performance for and next opponent in the league. Team name should be included.

seo_site_title_team_transfers.comment: Title for the page for a team or clubs transfer history. Showing players transfered in and out. The name is the input with %1$@ as placeholder.
seo_site_title_team_transfers.value: %1$@ - transfer history, players in and players out

seo_site_title_transfer_center.comment: Meta title tag value for the transfer center page
seo_site_title_transfer_center.value: Transfer Center - Latest & Top Transfers - FotMob

seo_site_title_transfer_center_selection.comment: Meta title tag value for the transfer center page showing only transfers for a spesific team or leage
seo_site_title_transfer_center_selection.value: Transfer Center - %1$@: Latest & Top Transfers - FotMob

seo_something_went_wrong_please_try_agai.comment: Used for failure toest in troubleshooting mail.
seo_something_went_wrong_please_try_agai.value: Something went wrong. Please try again.

seo_submit.comment: Used as call to action for submit button in troubleshooting mail.

seo_thank_you_for_your_feedback.comment: Used for confirmation toast in troubleshooting mail.

seo_throwins.comment: Indicating that the player threw the ball as part of a throw-in. We use this translation only as part of a throw in from the side. Keeper throws is translated in another string.

seo_watch_on_tv.comment: Explaining where the user can watch the match, what TV channel or streaming service.

seo_x_matches.comment: Used for the betting slip to show how many matches you have selected.
